mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a black and white photograph, mounted on colored paper, of a group of women posed on an interior staircase, with notes added to the front of the picture. Near the top margin is written: "Roanoke, VA. LINK Chapter, Oct 1950." At the bottom right corner a small piece of paper has been affixed to the phtograph. This identifies the individuals in the picture. Twenty individuals are included in the picture. Those identified include Mrs. W. Wood and Nannie Wood.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Roanoke, Va. Link Chapter, October 1950 (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia -- Roanoke
Nonprofit organizations
